segments.text: So how far is the museum , dad ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Finish your hot chocolate and we will go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are we going to come back here for lunch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , we will have lunch at the museum cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have finished . We can go now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's go then . On the way we have to turn right and right again at the next junction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's stop at the newsagent , I would like to buy a newspaper . We can also buy postcards for your friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you see a Post Office somewhere around here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes it is down there , at the end of the road , next to the supermarket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh good we are almost there . The museum is round the corner from the Post Office .
segments.speaker: S1
